name: Jet Dunk - Block Breaking
description:
Break the blocks and dunk the ball!
“Jet Dunk” is an exhilarating and elegant block breaking game!

Basketball x Block Breaking!?
A new kind of block breaking game is here!

Break the blocks to collect points then slide the bar to
the baskets at either side of the screen to dunk!
Dunking massively increases the remaining time!

How can high can you go?
Level up by breaking blocks!

-How to Play-
1. Simple controls! Slide the bar to break blocks!
2. Collect the points that drop!
3. Collect even more points! Tap to make your character jump!
4. Tap twice to make your character flip and launch the ball even faster!
